dc:title: The Spirit of Violence
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recoils at the senseless murders of "bums" by four youths on August 16, 1954, in Brooklyn. Links this violence to the hate and fear of the McCarthy anti-communist hearings in Washington and the violence of weapons of mass destruction. Keywords: non-violence
